sentences.en: A huge effort was made to exterminate the rats.
Back and forth go back and forth with strange treasure box, end exterminate two spiders.
sentences.cn: 与奇怪的宝箱来回周旋, 最终消灭两只蜘蛛.

sentences.en: It is necessary to exterminate the post at the sawmill.
sentences.cn: 必须端掉锯木厂边的哨所.

sentences.en: Much of our forefathers'blood was shed, to exterminate these vermin.
sentences.cn: 我们祖先为了除掉这些害虫,血流成河.

sentences.en: Poisonous clouds, manufactured by human hands, will sink down and exterminate everything.
sentences.cn: 有毒的云雾由人的双手制造, 会沉落和消除所有一切.

sentences.en: Some people exterminate garden insects by spraying poison on the plants.
sentences.cn: 有些人在植物上喷撒毒剂以杀死花园内的昆虫.

sentences.en: Staff use the poison to exterminate moles and rabbits.
sentences.cn: 员工用毒药来消灭鼹鼠和野兔。

sentences.en: The new chemical will exterminate the cockroaches.
sentences.cn: 新的化学药品将可以消灭蟑螂.

sentences.en: Their job is to exterminate rats and mice.
sentences.cn: 他们的工作是消灭鼠类.

sentences.en: This spray will exterminate the termites.
To protect their business, European farmers have started to exterminate at - risk animals and quarantine the others.
sentences.cn: 为保护他们的经济, 欧洲农场主便开始消除已处于染病状态的牲畜,检疫并隔离其他动物.

sentences.en: Vermin don't have to exterminate themselves.
sentences.cn: 虫豸是用不着自己杀害自己的.

sentences.en: We've made great efforts to exterminate mosquitoes and flies.
sentences.cn: 我们作了很大努力来消灭蚊蝇.

sentences.en: Woodpeckers can exterminate insect pests hiding in trees.
sentences.cn: 啄木鸟能消灭躲在树里的害虫.

sentences.en: You cannot exterminate them because from their seed comes more with greater hatred.
sentences.cn: 你们没法把他们斩尽杀绝,因为他们会播下更深的仇恨的种子.

words.tran_cn: 根除者；（美）灭鼠药；（美）职业的消灭害虫者

trans.tran_en: to kill large numbers of people or animals of a particular type so that they no longer exist
